Name: amtd
Overview:
Automated Movie Trailer Downloader :: AMTD is a Radarr Companion script to automatically download movie trailers for use in media applications
  [br][br][b][span style='color: #E80000;']!!!Important!!![/span][/u] :: You must add a volume that matches your Radarr's volume mappings associated with Radarr's Library Root Folder settings[/b]

Enable Automatic Script Start.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Enable Automatic Script Start.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Script Interval.Name: Script Interval
Script Interval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Radarr Url.Name: Radarr Url
Radarr Url.Description: Set domain or IP to your Radarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s...

Extras Type.Name: Extras Type
Extras Type.Description: all or trailers :: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurettes, etc...) :: trailers only downloads trailers

Extras Audio Language.Name: Extras Audio Language
Extras Audio Language.Description: Set the primary desired language, if not found, fallback to next langauge in the list... (this is a ',' separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes)

Extras Format.Name: Extras Format
Extras Format.Description: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Extras Subtitle Langauge.Name: Extras Subtitle Langauge
Extras Subtitle Langauge.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Single Trailer.Name: Single Trailer
Single Trailer.Description: true = enabled :: Only downloads the first available trailer, does not apply to other extras type

Prefer Existing Trailer.Name: Prefer Existing Trailer
Prefer Existing Trailer.Description: true = enabled :: Checks for existing trailer file, and skips it if found

Use Folders.Name: Use Folders
Use Folders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders within the movie folder for extras

End Client Compatibility.Name: End Client Compatibility
End Client Compatibility.Description: plex or emby or jellyfin :: Select the appropriate client for maximum compatibility
